docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: create

apis.short_description: プロビジョニングテンプレートの作成

params.name: template_kind_id
params.description: スニペットと関連がありません

params.name: template_combinations_attributes
params.description: テンプレートの組み合わせの配列 (hostgroup_id, environment_id)
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: operatingsystem_ids
params.description: Array of operating system IDs to associate with the template
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: locked
params.description: Whether or not the template is locked for editing

params.name: location_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: organization_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

examples:
POST /api/config_templates
{
  "config_template": {
    "template": "This is a test template",
    "template_kind_id": "698706415",
    "name": "RandomName"
  }
}
201
{
  "template": "This is a test template",
  "locked": false,
  "snippet": false,
  "audit_comment": null,
  "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:53 UTC",
  "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:53 UTC",
  "id": 1007981702,
  "name": "RandomName",
  "template_kind_id": 698706415,
  "template_kind_name": "iPXE",
  "template_combinations": [],
  "operatingsystems": [],
  "os_default_templates": [],
  "locations": [],
  "organizations": []
}
